parameter.name: COL_NAME

parameter.name: COL_NAME
parameter.value: Filtered Data Source for Time Entry

parameter.name: COL_NAME
parameter.value: Unfiltered Data Source for Setup Tasks

parameter.name: XPATH
parameter.value: //div[contains(text(),'Dependent Time Card Field') or contains(text(),'Independent Values')]/../../../../../../..//table[@summary='Independent Values']/../../../..

if.findElement: (//div[contains(text(),'Dependent Time Card Field') or contains(text(),'Independent Values')]/../../../../../../..//table[@summary='Independent Values']//input[@value='' or not(@value)]/../..)[1]//a[contains(@id,'lov')]

parameter.name: XPATH
parameter.value: (//div[contains(text(),'Dependent Time Card Field') or contains(text(),'Independent Values')]/../../../../../../..//table[@summary='Independent Values']//input[@value='' or not(@value)]/../..)[1]

error.message: Please check error message. Data already exists.

parameter.name: TEMPLATE_NO_DATA
parameter.value: //div[contains(text(),'Dependent Time Card Field')]/../../../../../../..//table[@summary='Independent Values']/../..//div[contains(text(),'No data to display.')]
